title: District Profile: New Jersey's Third Congressional
teaser: Republican Tom MacArthur and Democrat Aimee Belgard are vying for a seat left open by former NFL player Jon Runyan.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of District Profiles, we turn to New Jersey’s third congressional district, where Republican businessman Tom MacArthur and Democratic county official Aimee Belgard are vying for a seat left open by Congressman and former NFL player Jon Runyan. Dave Davies of WHYY joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with details.

  • See more District Profiles in our series

Guest

  • Dave Davies, senior reporter at WHYY in Philadelphia and fill-in host for Terry Gross on Fresh Air. He tweets @DaveDaviesWHYY.
